item.title: Capcom Aims to Make New Projects for Devil May Cry, Mega Man and Ace Attorney
item.content:encoded:
A new report by Capcom reveals that they will bring new releases and remakes of Devil May Cry, Mega Man, and Ace Attorney to new hardware.

Capcom has some massive franchises under its belt, which include Resident Evil, Monster Hunter, and Street Fighter. However, they also have smaller franchises, which have a considerable user base. Capcom has stated that it will work to bring more projects for these franchises as well.

Devil May Cry, Ace Attorney, and Mega Man to Receive New Projects, Remakes, and Ports

Spotted by Rockman Corner, Capcom has released its 2025 integrated report, in which COO Haruhiro Tsujimoto has spoken about developing new projects, remakes, and ports for its other IPs. The statement first talks about Capcom aiming to sustain their “KPI of 10% or better annual operating profit growth along with our long-term goal of annual software sales of 100 million units.” Their efforts are “focused on core IP such as the Resident Evil, Monster Hunter, and Street Fighter franchises, and mapping out mainline series entries and sequels, remakes, new IP, and ports of content to the latest hardware.”

The statement adds that the developers release “two or three major new titles each year,” but have recognised they need to grow their pipeline. Capcom owns popular IPs such as Devil May Cry, Ace Attorney, and Mega Man, and their goal is to expand the user base and improve performance “through new releases, remakes, and ports of titles in these series to new hardware.” They will grow these franchises into core IPs “by enhancing the brand power and cultivating loyal fan bases.”

In other news, Capcom stated that Resident Evil Requiem’s development started “way before” RE Village. Additionally, a former Capcom designer recently stated that Palworld “crossed a line”. What are your thoughts on Capcom developing new releases for Devil May Cry, Ace Attorney, and Mega Man? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Jeffery Dead Morgan wanting to play Arthur Morgan in the Red Dead Redemption show. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Jeffrey Dean Morgan Wants to Play Arthur Morgan in a Red Dead Redemption Show
item.content:encoded:
Jeffrey Dean Morgan wants to play Arthur Morgan in a Red Dead Redemption adaptation.

During a recent appearance at a convention, the The Walking Dead star took part in a fan Q&A session. As part of that session, one fan as him if he’d be at all interested in playing the main protagonist from Red Dead Redemption 2.

“That’s the one that I want to do,” he told the fan. “It’s not even a question. One, the only genre… My favorite genre is western and there’s not even a close second. And my son plays that game and it’s freaking awesome. In a heartbeat, I would do it for free.”

Though he’s mainly known for film and television roles, Jeffrey Dean Morgan is no stranger to lending his voice to video games. Back in 2019, he voiced a virtual version of his The Walking Dead character Negan for Tekken 7 DLC.

Do you think Jeffrey Dean Morgan would make for a good Arthur Morgan in a Red Dead Redemption show or movie? Leave your thoughts down in the comments or in the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming, read about how there was a remake of Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic 2 in development as recently as March 2025. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

Are you saying you didn’t have a Microsoft Flight Simulator and Stranger Things crossover on your 2025 bingo card?

Amazon’s King of Meat Developer Glowmade Faces Layoffs Following Disastrous Game Launch

Several developers at Amazon Games’ King of Meat developer, Glowmade, have announced they will be made redundant in January 2026.

Resident Evil Requiem PSN Listing Reveals Leon Kennedy Key Art

The official PlayStation Store listing for Resident Evil Requiem’s Standard Edition has confirmed the Leon Kennedy rumor.

Fans Think Ron Perlman is in Fallout Season 2 After Premiere Appearance

Ron Perlman appeared on the red carpet in Los Angeles for the premiere of Fallout’s second season. Fans think he’s now in the show.

item.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 And Netflix’s Stranger Things Take To The Skies In New Crossover
item.content:encoded:
PlayStation has revealed an odd but intriguing crossover for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, as the popular flight-sim game is bringing Netflix’s Stranger Things to the game, and in this day and age, stranger things have happened.

Stranger Things Season 5 is all the rage right now. Netflix’s hit show is into its fifth and final season, bringing down the curtain on one of the most-watched TV shows ever. In the gaming world, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 has launched on PlayStation 5, marking the first appearance for the franchise on a Sony console.

Someone behind the scenes was clearly interested to see what would happen if you joined these opposing forces together, and now there’s an answer.

You Can Visit Iconic Stranger Things Location In Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024

You’ll be able to explore Hawkins like never before. See and visit real locations from the show in the new Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: Stranger Things expansion, available December 9.

A PlayStation Blog said: “You will be able to explore a highly detailed map and recreation of the town with more than 40 iconic locations made famous by the show.”

Some of the locations include Starcourt Mall, Hawkins Middle School, and Hawkins Junkyard.

The expansion includes five new missions taking you around the town in a Bell UH-1H Huey helicopter, and you need to rescue residents in danger. It makes sense for any game right now to cash in on the Stranger Things final season hype, but a Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 wouldn’t have been near the top of your lists!

Head on over to the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server, where you can discuss all things MSFS 2024, and there’s even a Movies, TV & Music thread where a new Stranger Things conversation has your name on it.

If you’re interested in trying this expansion out for yourself, check out Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024’s PS5 Price.

item.title: Black Ops 7 Warzone Camo Challenges—All BO7 Warzone Camos & How To Get Them
item.content:encoded:
Warzone has officially implemented Black Ops 7 into the mode following the start of season one, bringing a whole host of weapons to choose from and exclusive camos to unlock.

The camo grind is a popular pastime for Call of Duty players, and there’s more than ever to secure with exclusive camos available in Warzone, Zombies, Multiplayer, and the Co-op Campaign.

If you’re on the hunt to unlock all the available Warzone Camos, this guide has all the details and tasks for every weapon available.

All Black Ops 7 Warzone Camos & Challenges

There are 12 Camos to unlock for each weapon in Black Ops 7 Warzone, with nine Military Camos and three Special Camos to earn, with Mastery Camos in addition to those.

Military Camos have the same requirements across the board, with some exceptions, while Special Camos have specific challenges to unlock.

Finally, there are also Mastery Camos to earn, which require unlocking all the Camos available on specific guns.

All Military Camo Challenges

There are nine Military Camos to earn in Black Ops Warzone, with the requirements being the same across all weapons and requiring Eliminations.

Unlike the other game modes, there are no exceptions to this for the likes of Melee weapons and Launchers, all of which still require Eliminations in Warzone.

All of the Military Camops below are available to earn across every weapon in Black Ops 7 Co-Op Campaign, with similar requirements.

All Warzone Mastery Camo Challenges

The section below is broken down into specific weapon types to make it easier to navigate.

BO7 Assault Rifle Camo Challenges

BO7 SMG Camo Challenges

BO7 LMG Camo Challenges

BO7 Shotgun Camo Challenges

BO7 Marksman Rifle Camo Challenges

BO7 Sniper Rifle Camo Challenges

BO7 Pistol Camo Challenges

BO7 Launcher Camo Challenges

BO7 Melee Weapon Camo Challenges

Are you planning to grind for all the Warzone-exclusive Camos in Black Ops 7? Share your progress in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Black Ops 7, take a look at the complete list of achievements and trophies, and find out how to unlock every weapon and Perk.
